articles.title: Anno 117 Pax Romana hands-on: Gorgeous, deep, and tricky to learn - Ars Technica
articles.description: After a return to form in Anno 1800, 117 aims to seize an even bigger audience.

articles.title: Epic goes to court to force Fortnite back on US iOS - Ars Technica
articles.description: Game has been pulled offline in Europe amid legal tussling.

articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: Pharma giant Regeneron to buy 23andMe and its customers’ data for $256M - TechCrunch
articles.description: 23andMe was sold by bankruptcy auction, a year after the company had a massive data breach.
articles.content:
Pharmaceutical maker Regeneron announced Monday it will buy genetic testing company 23andMe for $256 million following a bankruptcy auction. 
Regeneron said it will acquire 23andMe’s genomics servic… [+1173 chars]
